Package com.jcoinche.server

Class GameInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.ChannelInitializer<io.netty.channel.socket.SocketChannel>
          • com.jcoinche.server.GameInitializer

  • public class GameInitializer
extends io.netty.channel.ChannelInitializer<io.netty.channel.socket.SocketChannel>
    This class represents the life and execution flow of an upcomming TCP packet Each packet will go through our defined workflow from our custom pipeline, represented by layers. This server implements several layers, in the order below :
    • The SSL layer which will make sure that the packet is comming from a known source (the JCoincheClient here)
    • 4 layers of Google protobuf encode/decode so we can use the data we receive
    • The GameManager which implements our business logic
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    uberti_l
    See Also:
    com.google.protobuf, Server
